definitions.definition: Containing sand or grit ; consisting of grit; caused by grit; full of hard particles.

examples: That goth woman is very gritty.

definitions.definition: Intense and starkly realistic ; depicting harsh reality, especially violence.

main_definition: Containing sand or grit ; consisting of grit; caused by grit; full of hard particles.
secondary_definitions: ( film , literature ) Intense and starkly realistic ; depicting harsh reality, especially violence.
